activity_differential: people walking and conversing in hallway
people approaching and waiting for elevator

description: A group of people are walking and interacting in a modern hallway with glass panels and doors. Some people are moving toward the elevator area, some are conversing, and others are walking away from or toward the camera. The camera remains stationary, capturing the flow of people through the corridor.
